about_the_game: Learning Life – Mysteeri 24/7 is an immersive escape game for vocational rehabilitation and youth work. The game is a single-player game with linear gameplay. The game has three levels: finding and moving to a new home, applying for a job or a place of study, and managing everyday challenges. The game has been mainly designed for virtual reality devices, but because of COVID-19 it has been made available for PC. The game is well suited for all professionals who work with young people, for example in vocational rehabilitation, vocational education and youth work. Learning Life - Mysteeri 24/7 can be downloaded from for free. Currently the game only supports Finnish language.
